definition: thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Chinese stitchery, you know, is beautifully patterned and exquisitely embroidered.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，中國刺繡品圖案精美，繡工精巧。

sentences.english: Please quote us your lowest price for the embroideries.
sentences.chinese: 請告知我們你方對刺繡品給出的最低報價。

sentences.english: A unfinished piece of embroidery laid on one of the chairs.
sentences.chinese: 一件未完成的刺繡品放在其中一把椅子上。

sentences.english: The beautiful shape is embodied on the surface of embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 用藝術刺繡品體現美麗的形象。

sentences.english: In the Middle Ages beads were used to embellish embroidery work.
sentences.chinese: 中世紀時，珠子用於裝飾刺繡品。
